blogPost.excerpt: Lucky Carrot is an All-in-One Employee Engagement Platform: ⠀ ◾ enables the employees to recognize each other, ◾ brings visibility to employees’ achievements, ◾ makes the employees’ voice heard through surveys, ◾ gives insights to enhance employee engagement.
blogPost.body: Lucky Carrot is an All-in-One Employee Engagement Platform: ⠀ ◾ enables the employees to recognize each other, ◾ brings visibility to employees’ achievements, ◾ makes the employees’ voice heard through surveys, ◾ gives insights to enhance employee engagement.
blogPost.title: Lucky Carrot - Make your employees super engaged, recognized, & appreciated
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 幸运萝卜是一个全方位的员工参与平台。⠀◾让员工互相认可，◾为员工的成就带来可见性，◾通过调查让员工的声音被听到，◾提供洞察力，提高员工的参与度。
localize.tagline: 让你的员工超强的参与度、认可度和感激度。

localize.description: 幸運蘿蔔是一個全方位的員工參與平臺。⠀◾讓員工互相認可，◾爲員工的成就帶來可見性，◾通過調查讓員工的聲音被聽到，◾提供洞察力，提高員工的參與度。
localize.tagline: 讓你的員工超強的參與度、認可度和感激度。

previous.excerpt: A very simple font game for designers. Inspired by https://cantunsee.space/ 🐛 This is the beta version. Any suggestions are welcome like bugs, feedback, domain name, etc.
previous.title: Foont - A game for designers to identify fonts

localize.description: 一个非常简单的设计师的字体游戏。灵感来自https://cantunsee.space/ 🐛 这是测试版。欢迎提出任何建议，如bug、反馈、域名等。

next.excerpt: Brightful LIVE for Clubhouse is a collection of essential features that help your Clubhouse rooms standout amongst the rest. Visualize your ideas by drawing on the Whiteboard, while engaging listeners with Q&As and Polls.
next.title: Whiteboard, Q&A, and Polls for Clubhouse - Supercharge your clubhouse room and differentiate your talk

localize.description: Brightful LIVE for Clubhouse 是一个基本功能的集合，它能帮助您的Clubhouse房间在其他房间中脱颖而出。通过在白板上画画来实现您的想法，同时通过问答和民意调查来吸引听众。
localize.tagline: 超强的会所房，差异化的谈资。

localize.description: Brightful LIVE for Clubhouse 是一個基本功能的集合，它能幫助您的Clubhouse房間在其他房間中脫穎而出。通過在白板上畫畫來實現您的想法，同時通過問答和民意調查來吸引聽衆。
localize.tagline: 超強的會所房，差異化的談資。
